guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

title: Ruqqus, what are your goals for right now?

author.bio: Just a reddit rufugee looking for some OC and common interests without being "well, actually'd" to death.  Otherwise just an average American working for a living (sorta) and trying to make it.
author.bio_html: Just a reddit rufugee looking for some OC and common interests without being "well, actually'd" to death.  Otherwise just an average American working for a living (sorta) and trying to make it.

body: Just trying to maintain my sanity (and sobriety) for the most part.  I feel for all the other addicts/alcoholics in America right now - nothing I'd like more than to grab a bottle and pretend everything is fine.
body_html: Just trying to maintain my sanity (and sobriety) for the most part. I feel for all the other addicts/alcoholics in America right now - nothing I'd like more than to grab a bottle and pretend everything is fine.

post.body: What life goals are you trying to reach as of now?
post.body_html: What life goals are you trying to reach as of now?
post.title: Ruqqus, what are your goals for right now?

body:
Developing healthy habits and a good routine. 

I'm 30 and my whole life I've been trying to develop good habits, but they only last for a few weeks. I recently asked a friend if she had any advice and she suggested making two rotating weeks, one for my good weeks and one for hell week. I have PMDD and the week leading up to my period is habitually called hell week. 

It was a big lightbulb moment and now that I'm out of hell week I'm going to work on setting up the lists and putting it into practice.
body_html:
Developing healthy habits and a good routine.

I'm 30 and my whole life I've been trying to develop good habits, but they only last for a few weeks. I recently asked a friend if she had any advice and she suggested making two rotating weeks, one for my good weeks and one for hell week. I have PMDD and the week leading up to my period is habitually called hell week.

It was a big lightbulb moment and now that I'm out of hell week I'm going to work on setting up the lists and putting it into practice.

post.body: What life goals are you trying to reach as of now?
post.body_html: What life goals are you trying to reach as of now?
post.title: Ruqqus, what are your goals for right now?

body:
Pay off the mortgage and get my business rolling in a more serious manner.

Bought a beautiful place in the country 5 years ago with a 10 year mortgage.  Covid killed my job this spring.  But I've been getting significantly more money from unemployment than I was making so it looks like I may be able to pay off the mortgage and end up with the same amount of savings by the end of this year (more than 10k).  Also bought the Roland printer at a great price from closed down employer and am in the process of moving it home and adding it to the services I can provide besides the freelance graphic design work I'm doing.

I admit though that I've been doing a lot of coasting this year.  But I am making progress and with all the federal money pumping up my account it isn't easy to be 100% motivated.  I'm probably around 60%  ;]

Getting excited about paying off the mortgage.  After that I'll be completely debt free outside of whatever the taxman insists on stealing.
body_html:
Pay off the mortgage and get my business rolling in a more serious manner.

Bought a beautiful place in the country 5 years ago with a 10 year mortgage. Covid killed my job this spring. But I've been getting significantly more money from unemployment than I was making so it looks like I may be able to pay off the mortgage and end up with the same amount of savings by the end of this year (more than 10k). Also bought the Roland printer at a great price from closed down employer and am in the process of moving it home and adding it to the services I can provide besides the freelance graphic design work I'm doing.

I admit though that I've been doing a lot of coasting this year. But I am making progress and with all the federal money pumping up my account it isn't easy to be 100% motivated. I'm probably around 60% ;]

Getting excited about paying off the mortgage. After that I'll be completely debt free outside of whatever the taxman insists on stealing.

post.body: What life goals are you trying to reach as of now?
post.body_html: What life goals are you trying to reach as of now?
post.title: Ruqqus, what are your goals for right now?

body:
Not trying to tempt you to go out and spend....  but keep one eye open on craigslist.  There will probably be some crazy good deals in the coming months.  

When I was in the middle of buying and moving to my house 5 years ago a friend was in the middle of moving as well and had two small kayaks that he offered to me for $200 total.  I really wasn't in the mood to add to the stuff I needed to move to the new place or spend anything I didn't need after emptying a big chunk of my account for the down payment but you can't turn down an offer like that.
body_html:
Not trying to tempt you to go out and spend.... but keep one eye open on craigslist. There will probably be some crazy good deals in the coming months.

When I was in the middle of buying and moving to my house 5 years ago a friend was in the middle of moving as well and had two small kayaks that he offered to me for $200 total. I really wasn't in the mood to add to the stuff I needed to move to the new place or spend anything I didn't need after emptying a big chunk of my account for the down payment but you can't turn down an offer like that.

body: Graduate with an associate's degree and hope it's enough to carry me into a career in 2d Animation/Storyboarding. God I fucking hope so.
